faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about CraftWorks and how our platform works.

questions.question: What is CraftWorks?
questions.answer: CraftWorks is a platform connecting clients with skilled craftsmen for a variety of projects, ensuring quality and reliability.

questions.question: How do I hire a craftsman?
questions.answer: Simply browse our marketplace, view profiles, and contact the craftsman that best fits your project needs. You can also post a project and receive proposals.

questions.question: Is there a fee for using CraftWorks?
questions.answer: Registration is free for both clients and craftsmen. Service fees may apply for completed projects, which are transparently displayed before you hire.

questions.question: How are payments handled?
questions.answer: Payments are securely processed through our platform. Funds are held in escrow and released only when the project is completed to your satisfaction.

questions.question: Can I review craftsmen?
questions.answer: Yes, after your project is completed, you can leave a review and rating for the craftsman.

questions.question: How do I become a verified craftsman?
questions.answer: Sign up, complete your profile, and submit your credentials. Our team will review your application and notify you once you are verified.

questions.question: How do I find projects?
questions.answer: Browse the marketplace for available projects or get contacted directly by clients.

questions.question: How do I get paid?
questions.answer: Payments are processed securely through the platform and released after project completion.

questions.question: Are there fees for craftsmen?
questions.answer: Registration is free. A small service fee is deducted from each completed project.

questions.question: How do I improve my profile?
questions.answer: Add detailed information, upload your portfolio, and collect positive reviews from clients.
